title: Enabler: MIST: Implement Service Inventory Link to external SIM management
description:
Description
The Service Inventory will be stored in an external system.
This system will use a JSON structure for the stored data.
Querying of the SNow SIM will lead to an external query and interprete the returned JSON structure.
acceptance_criteria: External Links to different systems (NC and MDO) can be stored in the SIM.
An entry can be marked as 'External'
External marked entries will be queried via TMF-638 or TMF-640
SOM change Notifications can be received and processed in SNow
The returned JSON data structure  is decomposed and delivered to the calling flow.
